body:
Use this form to upload and send a completed application to become a property and financial affairs deputy to the Court of Protection.

You can only use this form if you have:

* completed all the relevant application forms
* a Payment By Account (PBA) number to pay for the application

If you haven't completed the application forms, read the guidance on [applying to be a deputy](https://www.gov.uk/become-deputy/apply-deputy).

If you don't have a PBA number, you'll need to [apply for a HMCTS Fee Account](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-fee-account-application-form-fee-account-customer-application-form).

### Before you upload your completed forms

To help the court process your application, name your files using the:

* date you're sending your completed forms
* person's last name
* first letter of the person's first name
* the form number (for example, COP1)

Use the format 2020-03-31 - SMITH J - COP1.pdf

The application fee is Â£365.
